basics.name: Alexey Ivanov
basics.label: Front-End / Software / React / Developer
basics.summary: Frontend / Software Developer with 5+ Years of Experience. Proven track record of optimizing cloud resource utilization for startups, serving clients like Airbnb, Facebook, and leading cloud archiving firms. Expertise in creating dynamic, user-friendly frontend applications using React and TypeScript, harmonizing UI/UX design with robust, scalable code. Excels at driving rapid, appealing application development while maintaining clear communication and a progressive mindset towards new technologies. Passionate about delivering efficient, high-performance cloud solutions that drive business success.

work.name: Self Employed
work.description: As a self-employed software developer, I specialize in crafting e-commerce solutions tailored specifically for online food sales.
work.summary:
— Led creation of e-commerce platform for online food  retail
— Optimized performance for fast load times and smooth browsing
— Integrated third-party services and APIs for effective functionality
highlights: Next / Typescript / HTML / SCSS / Node/ Express / MongoDB

work.name: Global Relay
work.description: Global Relay is a leading provider of cloud-based messaging, archiving, and compliance solutions for the financial services.
work.summary:
— Enhanced maintainability and scalability by implementing a new frontend architecture, reducing system errors by 20%
— Strengthened security features by developing a new password selection feature, resulting in a 30% decrease in unauthorized access attempts
— Contributed to reducing technical debt by refactoring legacy system components, resulting in a 25% increase in system performance
— Updated and improved design documentation to ensure enhanced project clarity and understanding, resulting in a 20% reduction in development time
— Managed the successful onboarding of 5 CO-OPs through dedicated mentorship and tailored training programs
highlights: React / Typescript / HTML / SCSS / Docker / Kubernetes / Figma / Jest / React - testing - library / Git

work.name: Capgemini Engineering
work.description: Top-1 global engineering and digital services company
work.summary:
— Contributed to developing a data pipeline monitoring application by creating and improving the API functionality, resulting in a 40% improvement in data processing efficiency
— Revamped the user interface, resulting in a 40% decrease in user-reported errors, improving overall user experience during interactions with the pipelines
— Expanded the existing UI by incorporating additional pipeline parameters, leading to a 30% increase in user engagement and interaction with the pipelines
— Restructured the infrastructure application, transitioning from a class-based approach to functional components
— Implemented TypeScript and conducted unit testing, resulting in a 30% reduction in bugs and a 20% increase in code coverage for improved code quality and reliability
highlights: React / Typescript / HTML / SCSS / Jest / React - testing - library / Git

work.name: Barsum Cloud Analytics
work.description: A leader in the Russian market, which designs software that helps banks run and save money in managing the­ir cloud systems
work.summary:

— Led the transition from class-based to functional components, enhancing application responsiveness by 30%
— Expanded the existing User Interface (UI) by incorporating additional pipeline parameters, leading to a 30% increase in user engagement
